![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5423875be4b03f0c482a58c4/421bf838-6118-4ae6-b7d9-b556072d4524/ABACBS+2025+Banner+-+10+years+of+ABACBS.png?format=2500w)

The complete schedule is available [here](index.html)


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)
library(reactable)
data <- read_rds("attendees_by_session.rds") %>% 
  setNames(
    str_remove_all(names(.), ".+ - ")
  )
```

## Thursday Morning

::: panel-tabset

### Room 306: Introduction to Agentic Workflows

```{r}
data[["Professional Bioinformatics: Introduction to Agentic Workflows"]] %>% 
  arrange(name) %>% 
  reactable(pagination = FALSE)
```

### Room 310: Introduction to Nanopore


```{r}
ip <- NULL
df <- data[["Introduction to Nanopore"]] %>% 
  arrange(name) %>% 
  mutate(IP = ip[seq_along(name)])  
reactable(df, pagination = FALSE)
```

### Room 310: Using long reads to analyse genetic variation


```{r}
data[["Using long reads to analyse genetic variation"]] %>% 
  anti_join(df) %>% 
  arrange(name) %>% 
  mutate(IP = setdiff(ip, df$IP)[seq_along(name)]) %>% 
  reactable(pagination = FALSE)
```
